articles.author: Mike Butcher
articles.title: European VCs and tech firms sign open letter warning against over-regulation of AI in draft EU laws - TechCrunch
articles.description: Executives from 150 businesses highlighted the risks of tight regulation, saying the rules could threaten the ability of European companies to compete in AI.
articles.content: Major tech founders, CEOs, VCs and industry giants across Europe have signed an open letter to the EU Commission, warning that Europe could miss out on the generative AI revolution if the EU passes l… [+7386 chars]

articles.author: Tim Bradshaw, Andy Bounds, Qianer Liu
articles.title: Dozens of ASML shipments to China face tougher export curbs - Financial Times
articles.description: The Netherlands seeks to align with US and Japan as introduction of licence tightens controls from September
articles.content:
Dozens of ASML chipmaking machines destined for China will soon need a licence to be shipped after the Dutch government followed the US and Japan in imposing tough curbs on technology exports.
